attributes.action: Cut public spending to below 40% of GDP and then make it illegal to exceed that figure.
attributes.additional_details: We as a nation are addicted to public spending, not only does it sap the life blood out of private enterprise it leaves us with unaffordable levels of taxation. We need less government interference.in our lives and restraint on spending would focus attention on what we we need to do rather that whats nice to do.
